content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=40.0, y=-84.0), refueled with coal, working status.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=40.5, y=-82.5) with inventory containing coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-83.5) with inventory containing coal.
- BeltGroup connecting various positions, transporting coal.

### Copper Smelting Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=-15.0, y=-49.0), working status, processing copper ore into copper plates.

### Iron Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chest at position (x=0.5, y=0.5) with inventory containing iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) with inventory containing coal.

### Inserter and Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter at position (x=54.5, y=-83.5), waiting for source items.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5), waiting for source items.
- BeltGroup with inputs and outputs at various positions, transporting coal.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors due to full inventory
- Regularly check and manage your inventory to ensure there is space available for harvested resources.

### Errors due to insufficient materials for crafting
- Gather all necessary materials before attempting to craft items to ensure you have the required ingredients.

### Errors when inserting items with insufficient inventory
- Verify that you have the items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.
